chunk:
Love Byrd Acai Bowl Facial Serum

Brand: Love Byrd

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Coconut oil, Acai berry oil, Raspberry seed oil.

Directions: Apply two to three drops of treatment on cleansed skin. Gently pat cheeks, forehead, and chin to evenly distribute the application before gently massaging it into the skin.

Directions: Apply two to three drops of treatment on cleansed skin. Gently pat cheeks, forehead, and chin to evenly distribute the application before gently massaging it into the skin.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
